00042 /**
00043  * @brief  The engine for controlling the copynumber workflows.
00044  */

00046 {
00047 private:

00062      */
00063     void warning(const std::string& strMessage) {
00064         Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: " + strMessage);
00065     }
00066 
00067     /**
00068      * Error out by calling clear() and Err::errAbort()
00069      */
00070     void error(const std::string& strMessage) {
00071         clear();
00072         Err::errAbort(strMessage);
00073     }
00074

00076         void clear();
